'''Dragonspine's Last Trio''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Dragonspine]]. It is required for the completion of the '''Hidden Exploration Objective''' ''[[Dragonspine's Glacial Secret]]''.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Secret Room should not be confused with the [[Mural Room]].
* The Secret Room contains the following:
** A {{item|Luxurious Chest}}, with a {{item|Crimson Agate}}, in the middle of the room.
** A half-buried {{item|Precious Chest}} on the southwestern corner of the room.
** A half-buried {{item|Exquisite Chest}} by the end of the entrance stairs.
** An ancient carving for the Hidden Exploration Objective ''[[Dragonspine's Glacial Secret]]'' on the southeastern corner of the room.
* Completing the objective will grant the {{Achievement|Priest, Princess, and Scribe}}.
